1.title: Holiday Sparkle, Bottled.
1.script: Some traditions are simply irreplaceable. This festive season, uncap the timeless taste that brings everyone together. Share a moment, share a Coca-Cola. Pure refreshment, iconic joy.
1.tagline: The Taste of Togetherness. Always Classic, Always Festive.

2.title: Uncap The Holiday Spirit.
2.script: Elevate every festive cheer with the crisp, refreshing sparkle of Coca-Cola. Perfectly chilled, perfectly iconic. Make your holidays pop with the unmistakable taste you love.

layout.text: Elevate every festive cheer with the crisp, refreshing sparkle. Perfectly chilled, perfectly iconic. Enjoy the unmistakable taste you love.

images.desc: A frosty, contoured glass bottle with a distinctive red top, perfectly chilled with condensation, centered against a backdrop of soft-focus, warm holiday lights and gentle, blurred festive decorations. The scene evokes a celebratory and refreshing atmosphere. No visual symbols, marks, or writing are present.

3.title: The Iconic Festive Refreshment.
3.script: The holidays deserve the very best. With its unmistakable taste and iconic form, Coca-Cola is the definitive refreshment for every festive occasion. Pure. Classic. Premium. Yours.
